amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to the promotion of United States offshore energy production.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 341 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 341 proposed by Senator Cassidy. (consideration: CR S1882-1883; text: CR S1882) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to the promotion of United States offshore energy production.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 341 proposed by Senator Cassidy.
